metadata.h1: Olive Garden Happy Hour Times & Menu (August 2025) 🍻
metadata.description: Don't miss the Olive Garden Happy Hour! 🕒 We've got the scoop on the times and menu deals, like $5 cocktails and appetizers. See the full list before you go! 👇
metadata.pageGoal: Detail the Olive Garden happy hour times, menu, and prices to attract customers during off-peak hours.

data.h1: Olive Garden Happy Hour: The Happiest Hours of the Day! 🍻
data.tagline: It's 5 o'clock somewhere, right? 😉 Get awesome deals on drinks and appetizers, Monday to Friday, 3-6 PM.

items.question: Does Olive Garden have Happy Hour?
items.answer: Yes! Many locations have Happy Hour with deals on drinks and appetizers. Availability can vary, so check with your local spot.

items.question: Are Happy Hour specials available on weekends?
items.answer: Nope, Happy Hour is a weekday thing. Monday through Friday only!
